title: Leslie Phillips, Comic Actor Who Sorted Wizards, Dies at 98
description: He made a name for himself in British satires, then late in his career reached a different audience as the voice of the Sorting Hat in the Harry Potter movies.
dc:creator: Neil Genzlinger
category: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone (Movie)
media:credit: Jeremy Grayson/Radio Times, via Getty Images
media:description: Leslie Phillips in 1978, the year one newspaper said he had been “one of Britain’s best known and loved actors for more than 40 years.”
